Package org.forgerock.openidm.jetty

Class Param

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.jetty.Param
public class Param extends Object
Provides the Jetty bundle (and in turn the jetty.xml) access to configuration supplied by OpenIDM, without having to resort to system properties.

      Gets an unobfuscated IdentityServer property.

      Returns:

    • getCertAlias

      public static String getCertAlias()
      Gets the https cert alias.
      Returns:
      OpenIDM default certAlias

    • getKeystoreType

      public static String getKeystoreType()
      Gets the keystore type.
      Returns:
      OpenIDM keystore type

    • getKeystoreProvider

      public static String getKeystoreProvider()
      Gets the keystore provider.
      Returns:
      OpenIDM keystore provider

    • getKeystoreLocation

      public static String getKeystoreLocation()
      Gets the keystore location.
      Returns:
      the keystore location, as absolute path, or if the path is NONE, return the jetty.xml file location.

    • getKeystorePassword

      public static String getKeystorePassword()
      Gets the keystore password.
      Returns:
      OpenIDM keystore password, obfuscated in Jetty format.

    • getKeystoreKeyPassword

      public static String getKeystoreKeyPassword()
      Returns:
      OpenIDM keystore key password, obfuscated in Jetty format. If no specific key password is set, the keystore password (if present) is used.

    • getTruststoreLocation

      public static String getTruststoreLocation()
      Gets the truststore location.
      Returns:
      the truststore location, as absolute path, or if the path is NONE, return the jetty.xml file location. If no truststore location is provided this setting will default to the keystore location.

    • getTruststoreType

      public static String getTruststoreType()
      Gets the truststore type.
      Returns:
      the truststore location, as absolute path. If no truststore setting is set, the keystore setting (if present) is used.

    • getTruststorePassword

      public static String getTruststorePassword()
      Gets the truststore password.
      Returns:
      the truststore password, obfuscated in Jetty format. If no truststore setting is set, the keystore setting (if present) is used.

    • getTruststorePassword

      public static String getTruststorePassword(boolean obfuscated)
      Returns the truststore password in either clear text or obfuscated. If no truststore setting is set, the keystore setting (if present) is used.
      Parameters:
      obfuscated - if the password should be obfuscated.
      Returns:
      the truststore password.

    • getTruststoreProvider

      public static String getTruststoreProvider()
      Gets the truststore provider.
      Returns:
      OpenIDM keystore provider.

    • getKeystorePassword

      public static String getKeystorePassword(boolean obfuscated)
      Gets the keystore password in either clear text or obfuscated.
      Parameters:
      obfuscated - if the password should be obfuscated.
      Returns:
      the keystore password.
